post:
Sharedspace SSD OpenVZ VPS

Choose one of our super fast SSD based OpenVZ VPS. All servers are at least Dual hex core E5 Xeons, utilising SSD drives in RAID for redundancy and enterprise grade ECC RAM. Combine this with our enterprise grade network controlled by Internap FCP hardware and we reckon these VPS are pretty tough to beat! These are hosted on our nodes in Dallas TX.

SPECIAL OFFER: 20% Off all billing cycles, monthly, quarterly, semi-annual and annual! Simply use the code VPS20OFF to claim 20% discount!

  • cPanel/WHM $18.95 Per Month (This will increase in September as per there industry announcement)

Included as standard:


  • OpenVZ Based Virtualization
  • Virtualizor Control Panel
  • 1 IP Address (If you require additional please open a ticket with support to order after initial order)
  • SSD Based
  • Premium bandwidth providers
  • Internap FCP controlled bandwidth ensuring your data takes the best route possible!
  • No contracts
  • 99.99% Network uptime
  • 30 Day moneyback guarantee
  • Enterprise grade server hardware! No destkop hardware here!

Network Performance:

Our network consists of 10G links to InterNAP & Level3. These are multi-homed by InterNap's FCP hardware, which ensures that the route your data takes, is the best possible. This is all done in real time

Server Location: Dallas TX
Test IP: 72.9.144.30
Test Download: http://72.9.144.30/1000mb.bin

Payment methods accepted:


  • PayPal
  • Credit/Debit card via Stripe

We operate Fraud checks via automated checks with FraudLabs, if your order gets marked as fraud and you believe this to be a genuine error, then please open a ticket with us and we will work with you to verify your order and get you setup!

Any questions hit us up at sales@sharedspace.io or drop in and have a chat on our Livechat on our website! Learn more at https://www.sharedspace.io/vps-hosting.html

We look forward to working with you!
